member.summary: Keeps the first record as the current record.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOFActionEnum.adStayBOF
member.summary: Moving past the start of a Recordset triggers the Validate event on the first record, followed by a Reposition event on the invalid (BOF) record. At this point, the Move Previous button on the is disabled.

member.summary: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 EOFAction property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOFActionEnum.adDoMoveLast
member.summary: Keeps the last record as the current record.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOFActionEnum.adStayEOF
member.summary: Moving past the end of a Recordset triggers the ADODC's Validation event on the last record, followed by a Reposition event on the invalid (EOF) record. At this point, the MoveNext button on the ADODC is disabled.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOFActionEnum.adDoAddNew
member.summary: Moving past the last record triggers the ADODC's Validation event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic AddNew, followed by a Reposition event on the new record.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IRowPositionChange.OnRowPositionChange(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Notifies the consumer of a row position object of a change to the current row position.
member.returns: An Integer that represents the result.
member.param: The reason of the event that caused this change.
The phase of this notification.
When this flag is set to true, the consumer cannot veto the event by returning S_FALSE because the provider cannot undo the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IRowset
member.summary: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB IRowset interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IRowset.AddRefRows(System.Int32,System.Int32[],System.Int32[]@,System.Int32[]@)
member.summary: Adds a reference count to an existing row handle.
member.param: The number of rows for which to increment the reference count.
An array of row handles for which to increment the reference count. The reference count of row handles is incremented by one for each time they appear in the array.
An array with elements in which to return the new reference count for each row handle. The consumer allocates memory for this array. If is a null pointer, no reference counts are returned.
An array with elements in which to return values indicating the status of each row specified in .

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IRowset.GetData(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Retrieves data from the rowset's copy of the row.
member.param: The handle of the row from which to get the data.
The handle of the accessor to use.
A pointer to a buffer in which to return the data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IRowset.GetNextRows(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.Int32[]@)
member.summary: Fetches rows sequentially, remembering the previous position.
member.param: The chapter handle designating the rows to fetch.
The signed count of rows to skip before fetching rows. Deleted rows that the provider has removed from the rowset are not counted in the skip.
The number of rows to fetch. A negative number means to fetch backward.
A pointer to memory in which to return the actual number of fetched rows.
A pointer to memory in which to return an array of handles of the fetched rows.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IRowset.ReleaseRows(System.Int32,System.Int32[],System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Releases rows.
member.returns: An Integer representing the result.
member.param: The number of rows to release.

An array of handles of the rows to be released. The row handles do not need to form a logical cluster; they may have been obtained at separate times and need not be for contiguous underlying rows. Row handles are decremented by one reference count for each time they appear in the array.
An array of elements containing bitmasks indicating additional options to be specified when a row is released.
An array with elements in which to return the new reference count of each row.
An array with elements in which to return values indicating the status of each row specified in .

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IRowset.RestartPosition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Repositions the next fetch position to its initial position.
member.returns: An Integer representing the result.
member.param: The chapter handle designating the rows on which to reposition.
